hero.title: Intelligent Production Scheduling for Modern Factories
hero.subtitle: AI-powered scheduling platform that optimizes production planning in minutes, not hours. Reduce downtime by 40% and boost efficiency by 30%.

industries.title: Industries We Serve
industries.subtitle: Specialized solutions for diverse manufacturing sectors

features.title: Built for Manufacturing Excellence
features.subtitle: Everything you need to optimize production scheduling, from AI-powered optimization to real-time analytics.

ai.title: Genetic Algorithm Optimization
ai.description: Advanced AI that handles complex multi-machine constraints and generates optimal schedules in minutes. Our genetic algorithm considers hundreds of variables simultaneously to find the best solution.
ai.benefit1Description: Balance delivery times, costs, and resource utilization
ai.benefit2Description: Handle machine capabilities, shift patterns, and deadlines
ai.benefit3Description: Instantly adjust schedules when priorities change

analytics.title: Real-Time Analytics
analytics.description: Monitor every aspect of your production floor with live dashboards. Identify bottlenecks before they become problems and make data-driven decisions to improve efficiency.
analytics.benefit1Description: Track machine status and production progress in real-time
analytics.benefit2Description: Monitor OEE, utilization rates, and throughput
analytics.benefit3Description: Get notified before equipment failures occur

scheduling.title: Visual Schedule Management
scheduling.description: Intuitive drag-and-drop interface for manual adjustments. See the impact of changes instantly with automatic conflict detection and resolution suggestions.
scheduling.benefit1Description: Visualize your entire production schedule at a glance
scheduling.benefit2Description: Smart suggestions to resolve scheduling conflicts
scheduling.benefit3Description: Work together with your team in real-time

results.title: Results That Matter
results.subtitle: Average improvements in the first 90 days

testimonials.title: Trusted by Manufacturing Leaders
testimonials.subtitle: See how teams are transforming their operations

testimonial1.name: Rajesh Kumar
testimonial1.content: We reduced our planning time from 6 hours to 20 minutes. The genetic algorithm handles our complex constraints better than anything we have tried before.

testimonial2.name: Priya Sharma
testimonial2.content: The real-time analytics dashboard gives us insights we never had before. We can spot bottlenecks immediately and adjust schedules on the fly.

testimonial3.name: Amit Patel
testimonial3.content: Our machine utilization went from 68% to 91% in the first 90 days. The ROI was clear within the first month.
